column3: News;Rattanakiri province: An Indian man has died in a provincial hospital after an illness on January 3
column5: the 38-year-old male Ram Pratap was an Indian soldier
column6: who came to  Cambodia on a business visa in 2017. He stayed in Village Aol
column8: Ban Lung.------According to a police investigation
column9: the man was suffering from seizures for one year
column10: and arrived at the provincial hospital on December 24
column12: without any relatives to take care of  him.------Doctors said that the cause of the death was from an unspecified chronic disease
